description: This file defines a multi-agent team setup for a software project, including agent configurations, tools, and team instructions. It demonstrates how various agents are instantiated and coordinated to answer questions, perform analysis, and execute code within a framework that integrates multiple AI models and tools.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific roles, tools, and instructions.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents working together with shared instructions and coordination mode.

classes.name: UrlKnowledge
classes.description: Knowledge source based on URLs with vector database integration.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: Enumeration for different search strategies in vector database.

methods.name: Path.resolve
methods.description: Resolves a filesystem path to an absolute path.

methods.name: dedent
methods.description: Removes common leading whitespace from text.

methods.name: asyncio.run
methods.description: Runs an asynchronous coroutine until completion.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Opens a file for reading or writing.
